tv.generator-info-name: WebGrab+Plus/w MDB & REX Postprocess -- version V5.3.0.0 -- Jan van Straaten

programme.title: JAG: Critical Condition
programme.desc: Bud has lost his right lower leg due to a mine in Afghanistan; during emergency surgery he faces bad trouble. Sturgis returns to Washington, and Harm and Mac disobey an order from the admiral. Bud encounters an astounding change of course.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Dangerous Game
programme.desc: A deputy sheriff dies while chasing a car carrying two SEALs in a Navy exercise. The driver stands trial for negligent homicide.(n)

programme.title: JAG: In Thin Air
programme.desc: Lt. Albrecht and Lt. Cmdr. Zuzello make Zuzello’s farewell flight before he retires. All is fine until Albrecht notices that his partner is passed out from hypoxia. Albrecht makes an emergency landing on the ship.Harm is sent to the ship to investigate.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Need to Know
programme.desc: As a favor from Congresswoman Lillian Dorning, SECNAV Sheffield asks the JAG staff to get the story of a submarine, USS Angel Shark (SSGN-559), which was lost on a CIA mission in 1968.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Friendly Fire
programme.desc: Harm serves as a judge and Mac is the contentious prosecutor in a case fraught withpolitical implications when an American aviator is charged with killing three Britishsoldiers during a flight mission in Afghanistan.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Shifting Sands
programme.desc: When a Gulf War MIA victim is found as the sheik’s wife in a nomadic Arab tribe, Bud prosecutes and Mac defends her against charges of desertion and, in a stunning turn of events, treason. Harm tries to get his old job back but is turned away.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Kill Screen
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must help Ralph when the FBI questions him after his dark web game play inadvertently reveals the location of a CIA safe house and results in the murder of CIA operatives.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Charades
programme.desc: Team Scorpion is tasked with uncovering a mole inside the CIA whose judgment is clouded by matters of the heart and is being coerced into stealing deadly chemicals.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Forget Me Nots
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must jog the memory of an injured former Secret Service agent who is their only hope of preventing weapons of mass destruction being launched from a secret U.S. nuclear silo.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Love Boat
programme.desc: Team Scorpion goes undercover on a cruise ship to locate and disable deadly stolen rockets.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Going South
programme.desc: Team Scorpion heads to Mexico when a tech billionaire hires them to rescue his kidnapped daughter.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Blink
programme.desc: In the aftermath of the night’s traumatic events, Andy and Dov try to pull themselves together at an all-night diner, but are caught off-duty and off-guard in a volatile diner hold-up.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: All by Her Selfie
programme.desc: Oliver gets promoted and Andy is tasked with training 15 Division’s newest rookie, Duncan Moore. But when Andy and Duncan respond to a messy homicide at a pawnshop, it’s clear this rookie is going to give Andy the challenge of a lifetime.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Heart Breakers, Money Makers
programme.desc: When Andy and Nick’s seizure at an illegal gambling house leads to a suspicious confession, Andy recruits Sam to help figure out who’s lying, why, and where the money is, before anyone gets hurt.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Wanting
programme.desc: When a tenement-building shooting leads to the discovery of an executed gang leader, 15 Division must race to find the killer before a gang war breaks out.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Going Under
programme.desc: When 15 Division goes undercover at a club-land bar that’s a possible hub for illegal handguns, Chris’s erratic behavior and concern for a specific drug dealer make Dov suspicious.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Two Truths and a Lie
programme.desc: As the officers of 15 Division try to hunt down the killer of Brian Gowdy – Andy and Sam go on the road to interview a list of inmates at Millburn Penitentiary.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: ACCRINGTON COURTS PT3
programme.desc: The third and final part of this terrifying and intriguing investigation into the paranormal activity at Accrington’s Old Police Station and Courts.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: TOWNELEY HALL Pt1
programme.desc: Yvette Fielding is back with the first part of a brand-new episode of Most Haunted. The intrepid ghost hunter has taken her team to the historic hall, which is said to be haunted by ancestral ghosts, the apparition of a white lady and a demon dog.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: TOWNELEY HALL Pt2
programme.desc: Watch the second part of Yvette Fielding and the Most Haunted team's investigation of a historic hall, where the paranormal activity includes the disembodied sounds of children laughing and crying and the apparition of a white lady.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: GLOUCESTER PRISON Pt1
programme.desc: Yvette Fielding leads her team in a two-part investigation at the foreboding Gloucester Prison, one of Britain's most haunted places, known for its history of death, fear, pain, suicide, and incarceration.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Innocent Until Proven Dead
programme.desc: TAPS has been called to Louisville, Kentucky to help three descendants find out if their ancestors arestill inhabitingthe property they owned in the 1800's.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Episode 3
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: TAPS Meets the Real Housewives of Atlanta
programme.sub-title: TAPS Meets the Real Housewives of Atlanta
programme.desc: The Ghost Hunters enlist the help of Bravo's The Real Housewives of Atlanta as they embark on this week's investigation.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Episode 7
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Little Drummer Boy
programme.desc: TAPS has received an urgent call for help from a Chicago community center whose patrons are being chased away by a variety of menacing spirits.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Don’t Forget About Us
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Franklin, Kentucky to investigate Octagon Hallwhere secret tunnels have been found under the house, which are believed to have hidden confederate soldiersduring the civil war.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Beka is dumped on Seefra after the Andromeda is stolen, and Dylan must prove the ship is his.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Still on Seefra, Dylan finds Harper, who has adjusted to life there.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: It turns out Doyle is an android, built by Harper to contain Rommie's core programming.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Beka wins a prize from a radio DJ, learns the truth about Seefra and locates the Meethus Diagram.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: A scientist from the original Commonwealth shows up, caught in a time loop.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Flavin returns, sparking a gang war, and helps Dylan develop as a Paradine.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.174
programme.desc: A hit-and-run, drug charges, and an alleged bailout leave a teenager suing her ex-roommate’s boyfriend for a loan. He claims he never asked for her help.\t\t\t\r\nA woman claims her former friend racked up charges on a rental car that was in her name.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.57
programme.desc: A father of four denies owing his ex-lover for bail after being\t\t\t\r\narrested for violating a restraining order filed by his estranged wife/A tattoo artist demands that a former customer pay for the balance on an unfinished tattoo.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.68
programme.desc: A teenager accuses her former live-in fiancé of assault after she allegedly catches him with another woman; she sues him for rent, security deposit, and bills.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.163
programme.desc: A man and his 16-year-old daughter move in with her 20-year-old boyfriend who later sues them for rent and eviction fees; they accuse him of stealing their property.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.50
programme.desc: Man alleges assault by ex-fiancée, sues for damages and unpaid loan for her schooling/Former live-in lover sues estranged husband for over $4,000 in personal loans and child support.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.255
programme.desc: A woman accuses her ex of drug use; he denies it and any owed money. Police intervene in ex-friends' fight over a boy's paintball gun. Dispute over basketball school tuition refund.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.102
programme.desc: A luau-themed birthday party incites a group assault between two sisters and other partygoers; organizers claims the sisters were not originally invited to the party.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.161
programme.desc: A 57-year-old man is accused of sexually propositioning a teenage grocery cashier; he sues her for money she allegedly promised to pay back. A teenager sues her father for the return of furniture that she claims was a Christmas gift.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.164
programme.desc: Ex-lovers dispute maxed-out credit card from alleged gambling binge. Daughter sues father convicted of domestic violence for unpaid attorney fees.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.61
programme.desc: A teenager refuses to take a drug test after denying charges that he smashed a car window and stole a neighbor’s belongings/A female nail technician sues a cosmetologist for money allegedly paid toward an apprenticeship.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.127
programme.desc: 11-year-old girl accused of pouring scalding water on 5-year-old boy; mothers fight over liability and medical expenses/A man sues horse trainer for saddle return; granddaughter sold it.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.115
programme.desc: Man accuses ex-lover of sending explicit photos/Sued for damaging ex-girlfriend's Mustang in accident.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The signature dish challenge kicks of Gordon Ramsay's US cooking competition, with the most successful team getting to enjoy a lunch at the LA Market restaurant.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: With a trip to Palm Springs in a private jet up for grabs, the contestants compete by cooking four pieces of meat to Chef Ramsay's instructions.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: A trip to a medieval-themed restaurant is up for grabs for the team who complete a special meal for 50 children and their mothers.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The teams must capture a flock of chickens and prepare four different chicken dishes with the ingredients they won in the previous round.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: This episode nets an exclusive “behind the scenes” look at what it really takes to get fish on our dinner plates.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Dan Dizio is the CEO of the fastest growing pretzel bakery on the East Coast, Philly Pretzel Factory. Dan goes undercover as Michael Downs, a data entry processor who will be switching jobs with Philly Pretzel employees.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Purdy’s dominates the West Coast, but is struggling to make an impression elsewhere. To boost sales, the Chocolate Queen travels the country, working in disguise in her own stores and factory floors.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: PJ’s Pets is one of the nation’s oldest pet store chains, but the company has a new President in place, and she’s determined to rattle a few cages. Margaret Kordas steps out of her stilettos when she spends a week working in her own stores.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: For nearly 20 years, T&T Supermarket dominated sales, but now competition is “cut throat”. That's good enough reason for Tina Lee, the boss of T&T Supermarket, to swap her upscale lifestyle for a week working undercover in her own stores.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Lynne Zappone, the Chief Talent Officer of Popeye’s Louisiana Kitchen, a restaurant chain that generates more than $2 billion in annual revenue, goes undercover posing as a participant in a reality show called Job Swap.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Rules of Engagement: Pilot
programme.desc: Adam and Jennifer are a 20-something couple who have gotten engaged and moving in together after just seven months of dating. Meanwhile, their neighbors Jeff and Audrey who have been married for twelve years try to set a good example.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Birthday Deal
programme.desc: Though he's unhappy that Audrey spent more than usual for his birthday party, Jeff wants to stay on her good side to ensure he gets his yearly birthday deal. Though Jeff won't reveal the 'deal.'.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Young and the Restless
programme.desc: After Adam has too many restless nights sleeping in Jennifer’s small bed, he brings home the bed he shared with his ex-girlfriend which causes a fight and leads them tossing out all memories of past relationships.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Hard Day's Night
programme.desc: Jennifer tries to help Jeff’s sore neck with a massage until the situation between them becomes uncomfortable and upsets Audrey. Meanwhile, Russell brings Adam along to help him fight off a school yard bully so Russell can get close to the teacher.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Kids
programme.desc: Adam and Jennifer’s plans for a romantic weekend fall apart after they argue about their different feelings toward careers, finances, and kids. Meanwhile, Audrey is having second thoughts about why she and Jeff have waited so long to have children.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Game on
programme.desc: After Adam buys an expensive video-game console, Jennifer makes him promise to discuss major purchases first, but Russell interferes and makes Adam question the agreement.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Jeff's Wooby
programme.desc: Audrey surprises Jeff by making quilt out of his old t-shirts but regrets her gift when he doesn't stop telling the stories that are behind the shirts.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Mr. Fix-It
programme.desc: Jeff and Audrey tackle marital communication issues while Adam and Jennifer discover whether creating a home-made 'videotape' will spice up their love life.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Flirting With Disaster
programme.desc: Adam enjoys stealing the attention of Russell's female admirers, prompting fiance Jennifer to lay down the law and Russell to seek revenge. Meanwhile, Jeff learns an important lesson about sleep deprivation.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Audrey's Sister
programme.desc: A surprise visit from Audrey's sister Barbara opens a window of opportunity for Russell to prove that beauty is more than what meets the eye - or at least a function of personality and good strategy.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Guy Code
programme.desc: In an effort to beef up their social agenda, Audrey persuades Jeff to double-date, which inadvertently puts the rules governed by the 'guy code' versus the 'marriage code' to the test.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Tender Trap
programme.desc: When Dog discovers today's prey is a notorious ladies man, he knows just how to lure him in. The trap includes a suggestive phone call, a motel rendezvous, and a crew of bounty hunters waiting in the next room ready to break up the party!(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Greed is Good
programme.desc: Today's fugitive is accused of assaulting a police officer, so Dog and the team are not taking any chances. Dog has to play on his target's greed and deploy some modern technology to set a trap for this runner.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Tears for Fears
programme.desc: Baby Lyssa wakes up in a jail cell, but ignores the ensuing media frenzy in order to befriend a woman waging a personal battle against drug addiction.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Picture This
programme.desc: A fugitive with a long criminal record has fled to Hawaii, and the bondsman on the mainland has asked Dog for help. Dog doesn't have much information to work with, but he can use the felon's desire to impress his friends to track him down.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Tag, You're It
programme.desc: To his traditional bounty hunting tools of confidential informants, canvassing, and silver-tongued subterfuge the world's greatest bounty hunter has added Facebook! A word to the wise for those on the run-post at your own peril, the Dog is watching!(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: A Family Affair
programme.desc: Dog likes to say, "The apple doesn't fall far from the tree," and this is a hunt where that is true. So will Dog be able to use one family member's troubled ways to catch another one in trouble with the law?(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Training Day
programme.desc: While the team tries to handle the bond that newcomer Alysin wrote incorrectly, sparks are flying between Beth and Duane Lee when he questions Beth's decision to go on the hunt without Dog leading the charge!(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Aloha, Robertsons!
programme.desc: After all their hard work, Willie decides to take the entire Robertson clan on a family vacation to Hawaii. But Willie's daily itinerary for the trip gets constantly undermined by the family's desire to participate in their own island activities.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Till Duck Do Us Part
programme.desc: Everyone comes together to plan a surprise wedding for Phil and Kay, setting up a special ceremony on their land, which the whole family attends. Si distracts Phil and Kay by taking them on a "trip down memory lane".(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: So You Think You Can Date?
programme.sub-title: So You Think You Can Date?
programme.desc: After discovering that Martin has to miss a Friday night poker game for a date, the guys (as well as their wives) take turns figuring out the best way to coach him for romance. When babysitting for Jep and Jessica turns into a rocky road.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Hot Tub Grime Machine
programme.desc: The guys realize that Godwin has never really asked them for a favor, even though they are all always helping each other out. Godwin asks them to help him get a hot tub, so they set out to help him pick one up.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: A-Jase-ent Living
programme.desc: Due to construction at Jase and Missy's house, Willie and Korie invite Jase and the kids to live with them while Missy is out of town visiting friends. Then, what begins in the duck call room as a series of "Gentlemen's Bets".(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Termite Be a Problem
programme.desc: Because of a termite problem at Duck Commander, the guys are forced to find a different location to work from - Godwin's House. But while at Godwin's house, Godwin gets a taxidermied gift from a past relative.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: John Luke After Dentist
programme.desc: John Luke and Sadie are getting some dental work done, complete with sedation, and it's up to Willie and Korie to take care of them through the process - including getting them back home safely.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Scoot Along Si
programme.desc: Si shows up to work on a mobility scooter, claiming to have an invisible injury from a fender bender with Willie. After losing her beloved turtle "Mr. T", Ms. Kay enlists Phil on a mission to find a new pet turtle.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Jerky Boys
programme.desc: A decision to try and make some duck jerky leads the boys to Godwin's garage and a minibike race. Phil and Kay have made Willie the executor of their will, and Phil wants to show Willie what he and his brothers will inherit when he and Kay pass away.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Going Si-ral
programme.desc: Si discovers Youtube, and, after watching a series of instructional videos, decides he can make something better. John Luke totals Willie's truck, and Willie realizes he may be raising the two worst drivers in all of Louisiana.(n)

programme.title: Time Runners
programme.desc: Special Agent Sally Biggs has a secret, she can rewind time whenever she wants. It's enough to make her a celebrity at the FBI and allows her to control almost everything in her life... Except for the disappearance of her husband.(n)

programme.title: Frank Herbert's Dune: Episode 1
programme.desc: On order of the emperor, Duke Leto Atreides moves his family from his home planet Caladan to another planet, Arrakis, also known as Dune. After an attack on their stronghold, his son Paul and his concubine flee into the desert.(n)

programme.title: Frank Herbert's Dune: Episode 2
programme.desc: The Lady Jessica and her son, Paul Atreides, manage to contact the native Dune population, known as Fremen.(n)

programme.title: The Librarian: Quest for the Spear
programme.desc: As a means of finding the legendary book known as the Key of Solomon, Flynn pairs with a brainy archaeologist to first acquire the map legend. Unfortunately, they must elude the sinister General Samir and the ulterior plans of Flynn's uncle.(n)

programme.title: Timeline: Timeline
programme.desc: Based on the Michael Crichton novel. TIMELINE tells the story of a professor who inadvertently catapults himself back to 14th-century France, in the middle of the 100 Years War.(n)

programme.title: What's Eating Gilbert Grape
programme.desc: Gilbert feels trapped - with no father present and an eccentric family to care for, he is struggling to cope. Despite the hardships Gilbert perseveres, but will he be able to live his own life?(n)

programme.title: 2012: Ice Age
programme.desc: When a volcanic eruption in Iceland sends a glacier hurtling toward North America, a family struggles to escape the onslaught of the coming ice age.(n)

programme.title: Bolo
programme.desc: Two convicts get freed from prison and become lawmen in a corrupt village.(n)

programme.title: The Cannonball Run
programme.desc: The classic comedy with cool stars and even cooler cars! Based on a true race event, Burt Reynolds leads an all-star cast in the ultimate quest to win The Cannonball Run.(n)

programme.title: The Christmas Consultant
programme.desc: This Lifetime Original Movie stars David Hasselhoff as a sought after consultant hired by a workaholic mother (Caroline Rhea) in an effort to get her and her family through the holidays.(n)

programme.title: The Flight Before Christmas
programme.desc: Starring Mayim Bialik and Ryan McPartlin. Two strangers offer to share the last remaining room at a bed-and-breakfast when a snowstorm strands their flight in Montana on Christmas Eve.(n)

programme.title: A Doggone For christmas
programme.desc: The CIA discovers a puppy with amazing abilities, they force it to become a secret weapon. When the pint-sized Jack Russell is freed from government clutches, he ends up in the loving arms of two brothers just a week before Christmas.(n)

programme.title: Siege
programme.desc: The siege was one of the worst and unexpected cases of violence both Napier and New Zealand had witnessed and it was all the more shocking because of its ordinary suburban backdrop.(n)

programme.title: Mortal Fear
programme.desc: Based on the novel. A crazed killer is infecting healthy patients with a disease that makes them age dramatically. No one can identify what the virus contains, and in the meantime they must race to stop the killer.(n)

programme.title: Twin Betrayal
programme.desc: Hoping for a fresh start, Julia, a troubled woman, moves to Los Angeles with her new boyfriend. After settling into a new home, mysterious things begin to happen. It's not long before Julia becomes convinced that her demons have moved with her.(n)

programme.title: Felicia's Journey
programme.desc: A young woman leaves Ireland to find her boyfriend in England, and while there is helped by a man hiding unsettling secrets.(n)

programme.title: Sing Street
programme.desc: In 1985, a Dublin teenager (Ferdia Walsh-Peelo) forms a rock 'n' roll band to win the heart of an aspiring model (Lucy Boynton).(n)

programme.title: A Royal Night Out
programme.desc: As Europe celebrates V-E Day in 1945, teenage princesses Elizabeth II (Sarah Gadon) and Margaret (Bel Powley) spend a wild evening in London.(n)

programme.title: Bonanza Series
programme.desc: The adventures of Ben Cartwright and his sons as they run and defend their ranch while helping the surrounding community.(n)

programme.title: Bonanza Series
programme.desc: A Texas town dominated by two feuding families mistake Hoss and Little Joe for hired bloodthirsty killers.(n)

programme.title: Bonanza Series
programme.desc: A mayoral candidate causes trouble in town wanting all foreigners to leave.(n)

programme.title: Bonanza Series
programme.desc: One of the Ponderosa's workers is arrested for murder, but things aren't always what they seem.(n)

programme.title: Bonanza Series
programme.desc: Traveling all the way from New Orleans, police inspector Leduque comes to arrest Ben Cartwright on a 20 year old murder.(n)

programme.title: K9 Legend Of The Lost Gold
programme.desc: When Kassie and her friends stumble across an old, broken pocket watch they begin an unexpected journey to unlock the secret of the legendary Garrison Gold. They'll have to solve clues to find the lost treasure.(n)

programme.title: The Stolen Princess
programme.desc: In the age of knights, princesses and sorcerers, Ruslan embarks on a quest for his stolen princess and to prove, that love is stronger than magic.(n)

programme.title: Captain Sabertooth
programme.desc: The orphan boy Pinky follows the Captain on an exciting and dangerous journey across the big oceans to the kingdom of Lama Rama, hunting for a treasure and the answer to who is Pinky's father.(n)

programme.title: Bottle Shock
programme.desc: The story of the early days of California wine making featuring the now infamous, blind Paris wine tasting of 1976 that has come to be known as "Judgment of Paris". Feat: Chris Pine, Alan Rickman & Bill Pullman.(n)

programme.title: Everyone Says I Love You
programme.desc: A New York girl sets her father up with a beautiful woman in a troubled marriage while her stepsister gets engaged. Starring: Woody Allen, Goldie Hawn, Julia Roberts, Edward Norton, Drew Barrymore, Natasha Lyonne, Natalie Portman.(n)

programme.title: The Loss Adjuster
programme.desc: Hapless Insurance Loss Adjuster - Martin Dyer - feels his life is spiralling out of control but discovers that even when you reach rock bottom, that some clouds really do have a silver lining.(n)

programme.title: One Way Out
programme.desc: A policeman risks his career when he accepts a bribe to keep his daughter from being implicated in a robbery.(n)

programme.title: The Riddle of the Sands
programme.desc: Two former British school friends take to the high seas to thwart a German invasion of Britain in 1901.(n)

programme.title: The Upturned Glass
programme.desc: Suspenseful psychological thriller about a prosperous British brain surgeon who plots to murder the woman responsible for the death of the girl he loved.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.sub-title: A Hunting We Will Go - June 18, 1976
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) becomes a bounty hunter who is handcuffed to his prey, a female embezzler (Jane Sibbett) who incites such passion in him that he becomes confused over her guilt. With Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.sub-title: Last Dance Before an Execution - May 12, 1971
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) becomes a convict in the electric chair moments before receiving a last-minute stay of execution, which gives him 48 hours to prove his innocence. Julio Oscar Mechoso and Jenny Gago guest star.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) becomes a wrestler who must prevent his brother (Jerry Bossard) from going down for the count permanently when their title match poses a threat to the man's life. With Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) becomes a college student working in the family bomb shelter business on the eve of the Cuban missile crisis. With Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: In a mental institution, Sam (Scott Bakula) undergoes electroshock therapy which results in his having multiple personalities -- from past leaps -- and Al (Dean Stockwell) loses contact. With David Proval.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Eat Sin (REDUX)
programme.desc: Under the effects of a space/time warp, members of the Tulip's crew find themselves alone in their own parallel universe, dealing with a separate version of their marauding psychopathic prisoner, "Five.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Bad Girls (REDUX)
programme.desc: When a wealthy socialite and his two daughters book the Tulip for a passage to Mars, Percy and the destructive young women become fast friends, creating serious trouble for Dante.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Bad Seed (REDUX)
programme.desc: Dante is abducted by an Orchard agent (Tosca), in an effort to track down Travis. Tosca believes that he is the key to the Divinity Cluster.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Travis (REDUX)
programme.desc: Dante finally finds his son, Travis, but the Raider that raised him stands between father and son reuniting, as the Earth's future hangs in the balance.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Resurrection (REDUX)
programme.desc: Eccleston returns from "the other side" just as Raider forces attack the Tulip... on their way to destroy what is left of the Earth.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Rebirth (REDUX)
programme.desc: Percy emerges from hyperspace without Dante or Luc to discover that 15 years have passed. When Percy tries to take legal possession of the Trans-Utopian, she runs into conflict with a starhunter, who is revealed as her cousin Travis, now much older.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Big Easy Money
programme.desc: Allen & Ton head to New Orleans in search of easy money, but instead encounter some bayou bidders with big-time bucks! They discover a pair of early 19th-century dueling pistols & a vintage airboat fitted with a turbine engine!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Fire in the Hole!
programme.desc: 1930s "blasting machine" dynamite detonator box; 1890s treasure chest with secret compartments. Ton smelts jewelry to forge bricks of silver.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: High Flying Ton
programme.desc: A nerdy auction buyer tests Ton and Allen's patience at a big container auction in Ventura. The guys discover a basket and burners for a hot air balloon and a 19th century German single shot rifle!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Money Makin' Monster Machines
programme.desc: The Auction Hunters team goes on the attack & ends up on a collision course with a hardened veteran auction buyer. They uncover a collection of speedy off-road vehicles and some hardcore heavy metal from the turn-of the-century!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Fake Punt Payoff
programme.desc: Ton and Allen contend with a large crowd of inexperienced auction-buyers at a huge storage container auction in Pasadena. They find a small fleet of Segway personal transporters and an enormous custom-made shotgun.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Ton's Got a Gun
programme.desc: In the affluent area of Mission Hills, CA, Allen and Ton pick up an estate unit that contains a minibike, a Depression-era slot machine and an 1871 Colt revolver.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Ice, Ice, Baby
programme.desc: Ton and Allen have to get aggressive when they encounter a towering opponent with a mountain of cash. The guys uncover a vintage ice resurfacing machine and an Olympic biathlon rifle!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Big Score
programme.desc: At a climate-controlled storage facility in downtown L.A., Allen and Ton's locker wins score them an antique cash register and a German H&K pistol prized by collectors.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Sin City Shootout
programme.desc: 1953 Chevy-inspired bumper car; scores of M16 30-round magazines; reproduction 1940s boardwalk photobooth; aerosol-powered spud gun potato launchers.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Wild West
programme.desc: Allen and Ton explain their strategies at a storage auction in San Bernardino, win two units, then have a Pepperbox gun and vintage Lionel train set appraised by experts.(n)
